group_1.narration: It was some time after wrapping up@the filming stage of our movie...
...that we first began to notice@the strange atmosphere swirling around us.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?@There's weird rumors going around?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! They're saying that you and the other big girls@from the East...
...are trying to make a new Magical Girl group...?
And that you might be trying to scout girls from@the Union?

group_1.textLeft: The Kamihama Magia Union...@which you're a member of, right, Chiaki?

group_1.textRight: Yeah. Tsukasa is, too.

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, I suppose the Historical Research Club is@another Magical Girl team, in a way.
But we're certainly not inviting anybody else in.

group_1.textRight: Yeah! And I told them that we're just helping out@with your movie.
So I think that cleared things up!

group_1.narration: We also learned that our fellow second-year,@Amane, had a similar experience during filming:

group_1.textLeft: I have heard a terribly strange rumor.
People are saying that the plot of the film you're participating in...
...involves a pair of twins torn apart across East and@West...!

group_1.textRight: What?!@THAT'S how people are talking about it by now?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...@I happened to overhear.

group_1.textRight: That's sooo not it!
I'm just playing the protagonist's younger sister,@who also happens to be Riko's older sister!

group_1.textLeft: Really?! My word!
...That's certainly a relief.
I had been worrying myself sick, thinking that if by@some chance...
...you WERE being made to partake in a strange@film, then perhaps you should stop...

group_1.textRight: Nah, it's fine.
I'm just helping some classmates with their project!@Don't worry.

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness...
I knew I could trust you, Tsukasa!
That seriously happened...?@Man, we've really got to apologize.
I'm glad that Amane's sister was so understanding,@though.

group_1.textRight: It seems that my read on the situation was terribly@off.
On top of being new arrivals, we're not affiliated@with any group.
So our actions...

group_1.textLeft: ...Are drawing more attention than you expected?

group_1.textRight: Yes, true.@But the biggest concern, if anything...
...is how our film involves difficult issues between@the East and West.

group_1.textLeft: ...Seems like it's a topic that tends to draw@unwarrented conjecture or suspicion.

group_1.textRight: Right. I asked Yakumo about it the other day, but...

group_1.textCenter: Right now, everyone from both sides of town is@working together.
But there was an awful territory war between@Magical Girls only a year or two ago!
So it's true that you ought to be careful...
You never know what could set things off again.

group_1.textRight: "What if this dredges up the previous@East-West war..."
"...and results in another schism between@Magical Girls?"
...Those suspicions could spark another conflict.

group_1.textLeft: Like how Ruri's great-uncle opposed the marriage...
...because of an assassination that occured@generations before their time, huh?

group_1.textRight: Quite.
The invisible wall that stood between Ruri and Tsukihiko...
...is firmly intact, even today.
